ProductInfo.Features:
3.5" LED-backlit IPS LCD, capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
8 MP (3264x2448 pixels) camera w/ autofocus, LED flash, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, panorama, HDR photo
HD (1080p@30fps) video capture and Secondary VGA camera featuring 480p videocalling over Wi-Fi and 3G
Apple A5 Dual-core 1 GHz Cortex-A9
iOS 5, upgradable
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 4S 16GB, 8MP, SIRI, 3G, GPS, WIFI Factory Unlocked (Never Lock) World Mobile Smart Phone (White)
